amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure tribal sovereignty with respect to prohibiting or restricting the cultivation of genetically engineered plants on tribal lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 227 (Roll no. 460).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 227 (Roll no. 460).
